column4: someone have a minute to help me troubleshoot my wireless card?
well anyway, I turned on my computer today and the wireless card doesn't show up in network-manager or in system>network
how do I go about doing that?
it's an atheros chipset if that helps
it tells me that ath0 is not configured
maybe because I am running network-manager
do I need to kill network-manager?
, set your AP and card info (plus security if u got) in /etc/network/interfaces
